revised_title: Analysis of the Ultra-Violet Band-System of Carbon Monosulphide and its Relation to Carbon Monoxide and Silicon Monoxide
tldr: The authors analyze the ultra-violet band-system of carbon monosulphide and its relation to the systems of carbon monoxide and silicon monoxide. They study the properties of these systems, such as degradation to the red, similar ratios of wave-numbers, and perturbations of low vibrational energy levels. The authors conclude that these systems share common electronic transitions and are likely analogues of each other.
